text: We do not sell this information to any third party, but may provide information to partners that assist us in updating, managing or maintaining our websites.

The Company gathers two types of information: (1) personally identifiable information that is supplied voluntarily upon registration for Upmarket Platform, submitting data through the Upmarket Platform, or when you enter certain other areas of the Upmarket Platform, (2) aggregate tracking and site usage information that is gathered automatically when you use the Upmarket Platform, and (3) Cookies (as defined below), to help us understand what areas of Upmarket Platform are most useful and interesting to our audience.

Your RightsThe CCPA provides California residents with specific rights to request information about our collection, use and disclosure of your personal information over the prior twelve (12) months, and ask that we provide you with the following information:Access to Specific Information and Data Portability

The Company gathers two types of information: (1) personally identifiable information that is supplied voluntarily upon registration for Upmarket Platform, submitting data through the Upmarket Platform, or when you enter certain other areas of the Upmarket Platform, (2) aggregate tracking and site usage information that is gathered automatically when you use the Upmarket Platform, and (3) Cookies (as defined below), to help us understand what areas of Upmarket Platform are most useful and interesting to our audience.

We do not disclose the specifics of this information publicly, but may share aggregated and anonymized versions of this information, for example, in Upmarket Platform and customer usage trend reports.
We only retain personal identifiable information and business data for as long as necessary to make available the Upmarket Platform, or to improve our services in future.
Google may use the collected data to contextualize and personalize the ads of its own advertising network.

These technologies include:standard web analytics informationbehavioral advertising which allows third parties to collect cookies to help us advertise offerings more efficientlyaggregated data about email click-through rates and video viewingdata collected through HTML cookies, flash cookies, web beacons and similar technologiesdemographics and other details to help us customize our sites based on your preferencesdata on view counts and video search functionality

Google uses the data collected to track and monitor the use of the Upmarket Platform.
This data is shared with other Google services.
We only retain personal identifiable information and business data for as long as necessary to make available the Upmarket Platform, or to improve our services in future.

We also use this information to gain insights into demographics, product and Upmarket Platform popularity, and the effectiveness of our marketing activity.
We may use a combination of identifying and non-identifying information to understand who our visitors are, how they use the Upmarket Platform, and how we may improve their experience of the Upmarket Platform in future.
We also collect information on your site activity when you interact with content, including but not limited to when you favorite, save or watch Content.
We may use your personal details to contact you with updates about the Upmarket Platform, along with promotional content that we believe may be of interest to you.

If you are located outside United States and choose to provide information to us, please note that we transfer the information, including personal information, to United States and process it there.
We may also share such information if we believe it is necessary in order to investigate, prevent, or take action regarding illegal activities, suspected fraud, situations involving potential threats to the physical safety of any person, violations of our terms and conditions, or as otherwise required by law.
We primarily use your personal information for the purposes of granting you access to engage with certain areas of our site, to charge you for your subscription, and to notify you of any changes to your account and Upmarket Platform.
We use your personal information for providing and improving the Upmarket Platform.

data_type: personal information provide in verifiable consumer request
text: We will only use personal information provided in a verifiable consumer request to verify the requestor's identity or authority to make the request.
When you visit the Upmarket Platform, our servers may automatically log the standard data provided by your web browser.
